channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Launches at CES 2017
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Kuri was a suggestion from one of our test families, and we liked it for a lot of reasons. Fun to learn that you share the name - definitely a coincidence, but a cool one!
item.content:encoded: Kuri was a suggestion from one of our test families, and we liked it for a lot of reasons. Fun to learn that you share the name – definitely a coincidence, but a cool one!

item.title: By: Jkuri
item.dc:creator: Jkuri
item.description: I'm curious how you came up with the name Kuri? That happens to be my surname and it is of Lebanese origin.
item.content:encoded: I’m curious how you came up with the name Kuri? That happens to be my surname and it is of Lebanese origin.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Kuri contains laser depth sensors for navigation, as well as capacitive touch sensors, a camera, directional microphones, and dual speakers.
item.content:encoded: Kuri contains laser depth sensors for navigation, as well as capacitive touch sensors, a camera, directional microphones, and dual speakers.

item.title: By: gavin
item.dc:creator: gavin
item.description: what kind of sensors are used in kuri
item.content:encoded: what kind of sensors are used in kuri

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: At this time it's difficult to say for sure - because of different geographical rules for apps and software services, at the moment we'd recommend holding off until we can give you a better answer. (plus, we have a Canadian on staff here, and his sister wants one, so it's definitely something we're aware of)
item.content:encoded: At this time it’s difficult to say for sure – because of different geographical rules for apps and software services, at the moment we’d recommend holding off until we can give you a better answer. (plus, we have a Canadian on staff here, and his sister wants one, so it’s definitely something we’re aware of)

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: So far, none of the dogs that have met Kuri have made that mistake! Hopefully it stays that way. We've had a number of dogs meet kuri, both here in the office and during our in-home tests, and most dogs are curious but that's as far as it's gone.
item.content:encoded: So far, none of the dogs that have met Kuri have made that mistake! Hopefully it stays that way. We’ve had a number of dogs meet kuri, both here in the office and during our in-home tests, and most dogs are curious but that’s as far as it’s gone.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Yes, likely December - we're working as fast as we can!
item.content:encoded: Yes, likely December – we’re working as fast as we can!

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Totally! We've got about 12 of them running around the office here today. If you end up racing them or jousting, please post videos!
item.content:encoded: Totally! We’ve got about 12 of them running around the office here today. If you end up racing them or jousting, please post videos!

item.title: By: Diane
item.dc:creator: Diane
item.description: Can you have two Kuro in same household? Say one for me and one for my husband ?
item.content:encoded: Can you have two Kuro in same household? Say one for me and one for my husband ?

item.title: By: Techeric
item.dc:creator: Techeric
item.description: "Holiday 2017" means nothing outside the US. Presumably you mean Q4
item.content:encoded: “Holiday 2017” means nothing outside the US. Presumably you mean Q4
